data.title: Arts & Events guide
data.text:

Echoes from Jewish and Gypsy weddings, chants from Orthodox and Catholic Church, Muslim invocations. Not to be missed!

Northern Lights: Lithuanian National Symphony Orchestra

19.00 @ Vilnius, Lithuanian National Philharmonic Hall

To mark 150th birth anniversary of composer Jean Sibelius. J. Auskelyte (violin), M. Grazinyte-Tyla (conductor). Charismatic conductor Mirga Grazinyte-Tyla, dubbed Prima Donna of the baton. Collaborated with Los Angeles Philharmonic, Seattle Symphony, Leipzig MDR, Danish National Radio SO, Copenhagen Philharmonic Orchestra, and others. Has been appointed music director of Salzburger Landestheater. Beethoven, Sibelius
